# Test Prometheus metrics file
# TYPE rox_sensor_num_containers_in_clusterentities_store gauge
rox_sensor_num_containers_in_clusterentities_store 150

# TYPE rox_sensor_num_pods_in_store gauge
rox_sensor_num_pods_in_store 50

# TYPE rox_sensor_network_flow_buffer_size gauge
rox_sensor_network_flow_buffer_size 120

# TYPE process_open_fds gauge
process_open_fds 100

# TYPE process_max_fds gauge
process_max_fds 1000

# TYPE rox_sensor_process_cpu_nr_throttled counter
rox_sensor_process_cpu_nr_throttled 5

# TYPE rox_sensor_process_cpu_nr_periods counter
rox_sensor_process_cpu_nr_periods 100

# TYPE rox_sensor_detector_network_flow_queue_operations_total counter
rox_sensor_detector_network_flow_queue_operations_total{Operation="Add"} 1000
rox_sensor_detector_network_flow_queue_operations_total{Operation="Remove"} 950

# TYPE rox_sensor_dedupe_cache_hits counter
rox_sensor_dedupe_cache_hits 80

# TYPE rox_sensor_dedupe_cache_misses counter
rox_sensor_dedupe_cache_misses 20

# TYPE http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket histogram
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="0.005"} 100
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="0.01"} 150
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="0.025"} 180
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="0.05"} 190
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="0.1"} 195
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="0.25"} 198
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="0.5"} 199
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="1"} 200
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="2.5"} 200
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="5"} 200
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="10"} 200
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_bucket{le="+Inf"} 200

# TYPE http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_sum counter
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_sum 2.5

# TYPE http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_count counter
http_incoming_request_duration_histogram_seconds_count 200

go_goroutines 5000

go_threads 50

go_memstats_heap_objects 500000
